title: South Central - 2 Bedroom Apartment
posting_body: Need help finding a place to live in south Austin (or any other part of the city)?
Stop searching through all of the fake ads and get right to what is available.
I'm a Realtor here in Austin and have access to MLS.
I also keep up to date with all the availability in every apartment downtown!
- Provide me some key requirements: budget, timeframe, etc.
- Set up a day to go tour the properties.
No problem, I don't mind going in person and video calling you from there!
- Continue working until you find the perfect fit.
I am a Realtor/apartment locator in the Austin area.
My services are 100% free, don’t hesitate to give me a call.
If you'd like to learn more about this property, or would like to review other available options, call/text or email me.
Also at Grackle Realty, if looking to buy, we focus on educating renters on how to become home owners.
Follow us on our Instagram to learn more!
*I strive to keep my postings up to date, but pricing and availability are both subject to change.*
